reference.title: Example plug-in defining new extension points

shortdesc.required-cleanup: The following plug-in defines myBuildFile_template.xml as a new template for extensions, and two new extension points.

example.title: Generated myBuild.xml
example.draft-comment:
created/updated when plug-ins are installed or removed. This file might be different after a new plug-in uses its extension points to add or override processing
When the integrator runs, this will be used to recreate myBuildFile.xml, replacing Ant file content based on extension point use.
